doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Zynq 7000 Platform System Level Control Registers (SLCR)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: This model implements the full set of registers. Only behavior required for processor reset control is included.

doctext.text: Disable change to ARM processor operating frequency when ARM PLL or clock control registers are modified.
